alert.note: Alert for Madison; Oneida; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 5:49PM EDT until July 18 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Oneida County in central New York... Northwestern Otsego County in central New York... Southeastern Madison County in central New York... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 549 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brookfield, or 8 miles east of Hamilton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brookfield, Richfield Springs, West Winfield, Bridgewater, Poolville, Exeter Center, Unadilla Forks, South Brookfield, Leonardsville and Hubbardsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
